attributes.action: ban foreign  student  work allowance of 20 hours per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in a time of recession,this country should provide all assistance in providing work for the english,scottish,welsh and northern irish.
on a visit to manchester airport,all the shops employed foreign students,the government allows foreign students to work 20 hours a week
these jobs should be for the local population.how can the people leaving school,gain work,how can the increasing unemployed gain work,if the jobs,that mothers,school leavers first apply for ,are filled with foreign students.
if they can afford to live and  study in this country,they should not be allowed to take our work.
and it might stop terrorists,applying for student visas and being employed in homebase in clitheroe and having access to unlimited fertiliser and bomb making equipment
